name: Konami Classics Series: Arcade Hits
overview: Konami Classics Series Arcade Hits is a compilation of 15 games from the early days of Konami. The games included in this compilation are: - Gradius - Rush'n Attack - Contra - Scramble - Horror Maze - Pooyan - Time Pilot - Roc'n Rope - Track and Field - Circus Charlie - Basketball - Road Fighter - Yie Ar KUNG-FU - Rainbow Bell - Shao-Lin's Road
